items.text: Behold, bless ye the LORD, all ye servants of the LORD, which by night stand in the house of the LORD.
items.plainText: Behold, bless ye the LORD, all ye servants of the LORD, which by night stand in the house of the LORD.

items.text: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, and bless the LORD.
items.plainText: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, and bless the LORD.

items.text: The LORD that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
items.plainText: The LORD that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
